bib.title: Lexical units as the centrepiece of a wordnet
bib.author: Derwojedowa, Magda and Szpakowicz, Stanis{\l}aw and Zawis{\l}awska, Magda and Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: Semantic relations are the cornerstone of any wordnet. In most wordnets created thus far, however, the nature of the arguments of such relations is unclear. The synset, usually considered the basic unit of a wordnet, relies on the notion of synonymy, distinctly difficult to
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 16th International Conference Intelligent Information Systems
